entry.name: MAV_STATE_CALIBRATING
entry.description: System is calibrating and not flight-ready.

entry.name: MAV_STATE_STANDBY
entry.description: System is grounded and on standby. It can be launched any time.

entry.name: MAV_STATE_ACTIVE
entry.description: System is active and might be already airborne. Motors are engaged.

entry.name: MAV_STATE_CRITICAL
entry.description: System is in a non-normal flight mode. It can however still navigate.

entry.name: MAV_STATE_EMERGENCY
entry.description: System is in a non-normal flight mode. It lost control over parts or over the whole airframe. It is in mayday and going down.

entry.name: MAV_STATE_POWEROFF
entry.description: System just initialized its power-down sequence, will shut down now.

message.name: HEARTBEAT
message.description: The heartbeat message shows that a system is present and responding.

message.name: POWER
message.description: Information about the main power source.

message.name: IMU
message.description: The IMU readings in a NED body frame
message.field: Angular speed around X axis (mrad / sec)
Angular speed around Y axis (mrad / sec)
Angular speed around Z axis (mrad / sec)

message.name: PING
message.description: Ping a target system, usually used to determine latency.

message.name: ATTITUDE
message.description: The attitude in the aeronautical frame (right-handed, Z-down, X-front, Y-right).

message.name: RC_CHANNELS_OVERRIDE
message.description: The RAW values of the RC channels sent to the MAV to override info received from the RC radio. A value of UINT16_MAX means no change to that channel. A value of 0 means control of that channel should be released back to the RC radio. The standard PPM modulation is as follows: 1000 microseconds: 0%, 2000 microseconds: 100%. Individual receivers/transmitters might violate this specification.
message.field: RC channel 1 value, in microseconds. A value of UINT16_MAX means to ignore this field.
RC channel 2 value, in microseconds. A value of UINT16_MAX means to ignore this field.
RC channel 3 value, in microseconds. A value of UINT16_MAX means to ignore this field.
RC channel 4 value, in microseconds. A value of UINT16_MAX means to ignore this field.
RC channel 5 value, in microseconds. A value of UINT16_MAX means to ignore this field.
RC channel 6 value, in microseconds. A value of UINT16_MAX means to ignore this field.
RC channel 7 value, in microseconds. A value of UINT16_MAX means to ignore this field.
RC channel 8 value, in microseconds. A value of UINT16_MAX means to ignore this field.

message.name: RADIO_STATUS
message.field: how full the tx buffer is as a percentage
